title: BELLADONNA
description: Enjoy your Belladonna sofa as a grand masterpiece in your home or by utilizing it as a sofa in your office or lobby, Belladonna says the most about the kind of quality family or business you belong to and the kind of lifestyle you embrace.

techInfo._: Internal frame: Wood and steel profiles
Back internal frame: Wood, flexible cold shaped polyurethane foam, polyester fiber
Seat cushion: Shaped polyurethane of different density, polyester fiber
2-Seater Size: 240cm W x 110 cm D x 73cm H

title: AMORINO
description: The Amorino Sofa represents flawless elegance. It works well for private as well as public interiors, creating an inviting space to unwind and feel accomplished.

techInfo._: Structure: Fiberglass, resin structure
Seat cushion: Shaped polyurethane of different density, polyester fiber
Upholstery: fabric or leather Integrated Coffee Table: Carbon Fiber Metal Legs: Painted
Standard 3-Seater Sofa Size:240cm W x 95cm D x 92cm H

title: JOSE
description: Jose is a monolithic couch series that makes a modern statement of harmony and calm. The solid wood base of the design is distinguished by an upward curve. Jose's spacious foam seats, backrests.

techInfo._: Internal frame: Tubular steel profiles
Back internal frame: Flexible cold shaped polyurethane foam, polyester fiber
Seat cushion: Shaped polyurethane, polyester fiber
Big Sectional Size: 375cm W x 345cm D x 80cm H

title: CHESTER
description: Hollywood Chester is available in conventional standards; armchair, sofa and sectional. It brings a mid-century modern feel to your space with tufted elegance, exceptional practicality and comfort.

Seat cushion: shaped polyurethane of different density, polyester fiber

title: MIYA
description: The Miya adds a touch of elegance to any environment with its smooth contours and clean design. This sofa's generous seating makes it ideal for both relaxing and entertaining.

techInfo._: Internal frame and Back frame: Resin
Seat cushion: Shaped polyurethane of different density, polyester fiber

Size: 210cm W x 64cm D x 66cm H

title: CLAYTON
description: Clayton brings to reality a comfortable embrace. Plush cushions entice your eyes and body, contrasting its firm exterior expression of a more sophisticated and stern personality.

Back internal frame: Flexible cold shaped polyurethane foam, polyester fiber

title: EDWARD
description: Edward is an inspiration came in the search for a beautiful sofa design that offers the minimal amount of decorative design.

title: KAI
description: Kai is a Hawaiian name that means 'sea' and was the inspiration for this creation. In fact, the Kai Sofa is reminiscent of the ever-present tranquil waves. Kai is the result of the thoughtful use of materials such as wood, metal, and leather, which are the protagonists of a creative idea.
